name: Moon And Fish
description:
In the distant sky the moon was shining and in it's heart there was a large power sorce in which the light seeds and fonomoons were working hard to keep the moon's glow but...
In the depths of sky and in the dark planet, silba (Commander of Darkness and Red Demon) suddenly attacked the moon and with it's attack moon lost all of it's power .
Silba took the light seeds and fonomoons to the Silent land and imprisoned them.
and now with out the moon's light the fish lost everything, In order to save it he left for the the Silent Land and went after silba to defeat him and save the moon...
